title: My pixel 4 is unable to find /read any devices to connect to using Bluetooth. Why?
content: Turning Bluetooth off and on, resetting headphones. Got lastest update for phone. Before update showed 1 tv and a tile, nothing showing now. There are more items in home that use Bluetooth, none of them are showing on phone when it searches for devices.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
